sources.title: His Fighting Blood (1935) KERMIT MAYNARD
sources.description:
Stars: Kermit Maynard, Polly Ann Young, Paul Fix
Director: John English

 A cowboy's brother falls in with a gang of thieves; when he tries to get his brother out of the gang, the gang orders his death--and tells his brother to kill him.

metadata.Plot: Tom Elliott is trying to keep his brother Phil out of trouble. When Phil is caught in a robbery attempt, Tom takes the blame and goes to prison. Cleared of the crime by new evidence, he joins the Mounties. His assignment is to bring in Marsden and his gang. When he catches up with the gang he finds his brother is with them. But Phil has a change of heart and decides to help Tom.
metadata.Actors: Kermit Maynard, Polly Ann Young, Paul Fix
